member.name: M:ORMAP_TEST.Form1.CreateParcelID(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Create a parcel ID from a mask.
member.returns: If a value is passed in that is not numeric then just pass it straight through else return a parcel id with or without leading zeros
member.remarks: I use the Format function with user-defined string formats which consist of either all (@) characters or all ampersands
